subject: Attn: Beneficiary
body:
Attn: Beneficiary   
Warm greetings to you and compliment of the season.
Re: Approved Payment File Reference (FQ011/UNDRC/B-60015/23).
This is to call on your attention that your outstanding payment file has gone through the final verification and have been approved to be delivered to you through a secured diplomat immunity channel to your door step. 
In line with the above, upon receipt of this message to get in touch with me so as to verify and normalize the payment file for immediate delivery of the approved sum to your door step. 
We quite understand the challenges you encounter in the past and will assure you that the delivery process of the approved fund to your door step will be done without any hiccups or delays once we are able to verify and authenticate your details.
Do be informed that beneficiary outstanding approved payment authorization letter will be cancelled out rightly should there be no response within the mandatory (7) official working days.
We look forward to your immediate response.
Kind regards,
Mr. Graham Bennett.
Payment Verification/Audit.

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary
body:
Hello Mr. Graham Bennett,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing this information about my payment file. I appreciate your assurance that the delivery process will be smooth and without any delays.

Before we proceed, I would like to ask a few questions to ensure everything is in order. Could you please provide me with more details about the payment file? Specifically, what is the approved sum that will be delivered to my doorstep?

Additionally, could you explain what you mean by "secured diplomat immunity channel"? I'm not familiar with this term and would like to understand how it ensures the safety of the delivery.

Lastly, could you clarify what information or details you require from me in order to verify and normalize the payment file? I want to make sure I provide the correct information.

Thank you again for your assistance. I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Ashley

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary
body:
Attn: Eileen.

Your email is well received and noted.

Approved assigned payment amount US$4.5M with  payment reference  (
*FQ011/UNDRC/B-60015/23*).

Please find below one again my previous email which explained some of your
questions raised.

Do be informed that the pending unsettled payment was recalled from the
financial entity to the International Monetary Fund after receiving all
pending payment files during the joint session between the IMF/UN and the
financial entity that was previously in charge of your pending payment.
During the joint session meeting in the last quarter of 2023 financial
audit year, there was a resolution to complete this payment exercise
through a diplomatic delivery channel, since there have been various
interest groups associated with your payment that have hindered or delayed
your payment for a period of time now.

On this note, what you are expected to do is to fill the attached Unsettled
Payment Claims form DX-12 for due verification and authentication purposes.
If you are unable to print and fill the claims form DX-12, you can as well
provide the complete details as requested on the form and I will personally
fill the form on your behalf. Once that is done, I will forward it to the
IMF Admin and Fund assessment Unit for due confirmation. Once the
verification is completed which normally takes 48 working hours, the
unsettled payment will be approved and subsequently you will be assigned
with a top delivery agent/diplomat based on your geographic location  who
will be in contact with you via telephone to work out the delivery
modalities with you.

Do find attached copy of the claims DX-12 Form once again.

We look forward to your immediate response.


Kind regards,

Mr. Graham Bennett.
Payment Verification/Audit.

------

The information contained in this message and or attachments is intended
only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain
confidential and/or privileged material.  Any review, transmissible,
dissemination or other use of, or taking of any action in reliance upon,
this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient
is prohibited. If you received this in error, please contact the sender and
delete the material from any system and destroy any copies.

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary
body:
Hello Mr. Graham Bennett,

Thank you for your email and for providing me with more information about the pending payment. I appreciate your efforts in explaining the situation to me.

I understand that the payment was recalled from the previous financial entity and is now being handled by the Monetary Fund through a diplomatic delivery channel. That sounds like a complex process. Could you please explain why there were various interest groups associated with my payment? I'm curious to know what caused the delays.

Regarding the Unsettled Payment Claims form, I am unable to print it at the moment. However, I can provide you with all the necessary details so that you can fill it on my behalf. Please let me know what information you require from me.

Also, could you please clarify how long it usually takes for the form to be completed and approved? And once that is done, how soon can I expect to be contacted by the delivery agent diplomat?

Thank you again for your assistance. I look forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Ashley

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary
body:
Attn: Eileen.

I am in receipt of your email and the content with few questions raised
duly noted. The previous unsettled payment was delayed due to some bottle
neck and different demand by some interest group demanding for one document
or the other that may lead to financial obligation on your part. We have
received a series of reports and have decided to cancel all payments and
funds were recalled and a new mode of payment system introduced which is by
releasing the funds through the proposed diplomatic delivery channel.
However, if the delivery process seems complicated to you, we can adopt a
direct credit to your account through any of our offshore financial
institutions.

If you are unable to fill the claims form DX-12 providing the
necessary details as requested, I will assist you in filling up the form by
sending me the needed information as contained in the form. Once I have the
needed information, I will make my remarks and forward it to the Admin and
Fund Assessment Uni for authentication and the diplomat will be assigned
afterwards who will be in contact with you in order to inform you of his
delivery schedule. In most cases this process takes up to 7 working days
once the diplomat is assigned.

We look forward to your immediate response.

Kind regards,

Mr. Graham Bennett.
Payment Verification/Audit.

------

The information contained in this message and or attachments is intended
only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain
confidential and/or privileged material.  Any review, transmissible,
dissemination or other use of, or taking of any action in reliance upon,
this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient
is prohibited. If you received this in error, please contact the sender and
delete the material from any system and destroy any copies.

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary
body:
Hello Mr. Graham Bennett,

Thank you for your email and for providing me with an update on the payment situation. I understand that there were some delays and complications, but I appreciate your efforts to resolve them.

I have a few questions regarding the new mode of payment through the proposed diplomatic delivery channel. Could you please provide more details about how this process works? How long does it usually take for the funds to be delivered through this method?

Additionally, you mentioned filling out a claims form. Could you please explain what information is required in this form? I want to make sure I provide all the necessary details accurately.

Thank you again for your assistance. I look forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Ashley

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary
body: I have answered your question in my previous email. Please check properly.

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I apologize if I missed your previous email or misunderstood your question. Could you please provide me with some more details or clarify the information you shared? I want to make sure I fully understand what you're trying to convey.

Looking forward to hearing back from you.

Best wishes,
Ashley
